entities.description: The severity of opioid use disorder among past year users.
The severity of CNS stimulant use disorder among past year users.
The severity of drug use disorder among past year users.
The severity of any substance use disorder among past year users.
Indicates a mild disorder based on a specified comment code.
Indicates a moderate disorder based on a specified comment code.
Indicates a severe disorder based on a specified comment code.
No past year use disorder based on all source variables.

relationships.description: Relates opioid use disorder severity to its level (mild, moderate, severe, or no past year use disorder).
Relates CNS stimulant use disorder severity to its level (mild, moderate, severe, or no past year use disorder).
Relates drug use disorder severity to its level (mild, moderate, severe, or no past year use disorder).
Relates substance use disorder severity to its level (mild, moderate, severe, or no past year use disorder).
Defines the mild severity level of a use disorder.
Defines the moderate severity level of a use disorder.
Defines the severe severity level of a use disorder.
Defines the absence of a use disorder in the past year.
